answers.author: Katharine Greenlee
answers.text:
Hi Robert, 
I believe you are looking for ICMA-RC which handles retirement accounts. ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations. You can visit their website at ww.icmarc.org or call 1-800-669-7400. 
Katharine Greenlee
Community Engagement Manager, Knowledge Network
kgreenlee@icma.org

author: Robert Bereiter
text:
I am now retired and would like to have my account closed and the funds sent to another location.  What information do you need for this to happen?  What issues will I confront, such as taxes, etc.  Can the distribution be done incrementally to minimize taxation...as in over two tax years?
Also, when I tried to call the computer asked for a PIN, as far as I know I have never had a PIN for this account.
Please advise...B.
title: Retired Retrieval 457 Deferred Comp Plan
